shorts.title: Lackawanna County contract with SEIU to save $1.2M in health care costs
shorts.title_distilled: Lackawanna County contract with SEIU to save $1.
shorts.description: The Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.2 million in health care costs
shorts.content: The Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.2 million in health care costs

shorts.title: Fidelity Bank Welcomes James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to Board of Directors
shorts.title_distilled: Fidelity Bank Welcomes James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A.
shorts.description: DUNMORE, Pa., Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brian J. Cali, Chairman of the Board of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce the appointment of James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to its Board of Directors.
shorts.content: DUNMORE, Pa., Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brian J. Cali, Chairman of the Board of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce the appointment of James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to its Board of Directors.

shorts.title: Troopers claim retaliation in lawsuit over alleged payroll fraud
shorts.title_distilled: Troopers claim retaliation in lawsuit over alleged payroll fraud.
shorts.description: Two Pennsylvania state troopers have filed a lawsuit against Gov. Josh Shapiro and others, claiming they faced retaliation after reporting payroll fraud within the department.

shorts.title: HS BASKETBALL: Top 10 polls stabilize as season heads into second half
shorts.title_distilled: HS BASKETBALL: Top 10 polls stabilize as season heads into second half.
shorts.description: After weeks of chaos and multiple changes, especially at the top of the rankings, there was a measure of stability in high school basketball in the Lackawanna League. In the eighth Times-Tribune High School Basketball Top 10 Polls, there is one new team and one change in the teams’ ranking from last week. All 10 teams in the boys’ ranking remained in the same position as last week. Holy Cross is the only new girls team, while Scranton and Valley View flipped spots after the Lady Knights earned a head-to-head meeting at the start of the week. The first five […]
shorts.content: After weeks of chaos and multiple changes, especially at the top of the rankings, there was a measure of stability in high school basketball in the Lackawanna League. In the eighth Times-Tribune High School Basketball Top 10 Polls, there is one new team and one change in the teams’ ranking from last week. All 10 teams in the boys’ ranking remained in the same position as last week. Holy Cross is the only new girls team, while Scranton and Valley View flipped spots after the Lady Knights earned a head-to-head meeting at the start of the week. The first five […]
shorts.content_distilled: After weeks of chaos and multiple changes, especially at the top of the rankings, there was a measure of stability in high school basketball in the Lackawanna League.

shorts.title: Monday Update: McDade Park disc golf course on track for spring
shorts.title_distilled: Monday Update: McDade Park disc golf course on track for spring.
shorts.description: A 12-hole disc golf course at Lackawanna County's McDade Park in Scranton should be ready for play this spring, county Parks and Recreation Director Paul Bechtel said.
shorts.content: A 12-hole disc golf course at Lackawanna County's McDade Park in Scranton should be ready for play this spring, county Parks and Recreation Director Paul Bechtel said.

shorts.title: State gaming control board reports December increase; NEPA numbers mixed
shorts.title_distilled: State gaming control board reports December increase; NEPA numbers mixed.

shorts.title: As winter storm bore down, Lackawanna County tried to keep a step ahead
shorts.title_distilled: As winter storm bore down, Lackawanna County tried to keep a step ahead.
shorts.description: Drivers seemed largely to heed warnings to stay off the roads. Keeping up with the shoveling, however, would keep most everyone busy

shorts.title: LCTA, COLTS buses to stay put Monday as snow pummels NEPA
shorts.title_distilled: LCTA, COLTS buses to stay put Monday as snow pummels NEPA.
shorts.description: (WBRE/WYOU) — The Luzerne County Transportation Authority (LCTA) and the County of Lackawanna Transit System (COLTS) made announcements on Sunday as snow continued to fall across Northeastern Pennsylvania, that they will be suspending their services for Monday. Marketing and Communications Director Gretchen Wintermantel told 28/22 News that LCTA offices will be closed and services will [...]

shorts.title: Track plows in your area amid winter storm
shorts.title_distilled: Track plows in your area amid winter storm.
shorts.description: (WBRE/WYOU) — As snow falls across our area, crews with the Pennsylvania Department of Transportation (PennDOT) were out in force clearing snow on northeastern Pennsylvania roads. On 511PA.com, residents can check the current road conditions, restrictions, and closures online. 28/22 News previously reported on the launch of the "Where's My Plow?" feature, where residents can [...]

shorts.title: Multiple flights grounded as winter storm hits NEPA
shorts.title_distilled: Multiple flights grounded as winter storm hits NEPA.
shorts.description: LUZERNE COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Several flights were reportedly grounded Sunday as a snowstorm hit Northeastern Pennsylvania. Wilkes-Barre/Scranton International Airport says four arrival flights from Philadelphia have been cancelled, starting from 1:15 p.m. until 11:50 p.m. One American Airlines arrival flight slated to arrive at about 1:45 p.m. from Charlotte has been delayed, authorities say. Meanwhile, [...]
